item.title: XHTML + CSS (Not Sure Where to Post?)
item.dc:creator: @sp11k3t3ht3rd sp11k3t3ht3rd
item.description:
@sp11k3t3ht3rd wrote:

I’m following thenewboston’s XHTML and CSS tutorials on YouTube and I’m on XHTML and CSS Tutorial - 19 - text-align and Changing Background Color. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4IYs-B0lwhw. I’m using his code exactly (at least I think I am) but my h3 won’t center and my paragraph won’t indent.

[code]

<head>

	<style type="text/css">

		h3 {
		font-align:center;
		}
		
		p {
		font-indent:25px;
		}
	
	</style>

</head>

<body>

	<h3>Random Title</h3>
	<p>Blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, </p>

</body>
[/code]

What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic
